claims.claim: GenAI enables faster and more complete answers to agronomy questions
claims.quote: We are confident we can train GenAI models on our agronomic and product knowledge and empower our people to answer a vast majority of agronomy and product questions faster and more completely than ever before.

claims.claim: GenAI makes specialized agronomic knowledge more accessible and convenient to synthesize
claims.quote: GenAI has helped organize the agronomic knowledge in a way that makes retrieval easy and accessible.

claims.claim: AI can revolutionize customer service by making technical information readily available
claims.quote: This can revolutionize the way we serve our customers, allowing us to both build our institutional knowledge and make highly technical information readily available to our employees, partners and customers.

claims.claim: AI implementation resulted in cost savings of up to $25 per acre each season
claims.quote: This precision farming, backed by AI, has led to savings of up to $25 per acre each season.

claims.claim: AI-powered solutions substantially reduced pesticide use and minimized crop loss
claims.quote: The introduction of AI-powered solutions like Croptimus™ has substantially reduced the need for pesticides, minimized crop loss, and enhanced scouting efficiency.

claims.claim: AI enables early pest detection allowing use of less toxic solutions for cleaner produce
claims.quote: Furthermore, the early pest detection has allowed farmers to employ less toxic solutions, thus ensuring cleaner produce.

claims.claim: AI promotes efficiency and enables sustainable farming practices
claims.quote: The use of AI not only promotes efficiency but also paves the way for sustainable practices that can benefit farmers, communities, and the planet.
